title: [我雖勢弱言輕 決不虛作無聲] 聲援中彈中五生

replies.msg:
莘莘學子連月來活躍參與逆權運動，成為運動不可或缺的一部分。國殤之日，警方企圖大開殺戒，竟近距離對示威者胸口連開兩槍，該名示威者需以人工心肺續命。該名示威者僅為中五生，卻願為民主自由押上性命。有鑑於止，我等希望各位學生、老師、市民能於星期五(4/10)六時在又一城行街，聲援義士，並重申「五大訴求 缺一不可」。

香港人，革命尚未成功。

Students have played an instrumental role in the anti-government movement over the past few months. On October 1st, the police recklessly fired two live bullets at a student’s chest, resulting in pulmonary hemorrhage. The student is only 17 years old, as was willing to put his life on the line if it meant a free, democratic Hong Kong. Therefore, we hope that students, teachers, and students alike can go to Festival Walk on Friday (4/10) at 6:00pm to reiterate our demands and support our fellow protestors.

The war has no been won.
The war has NOT been won
